column1: Table 5.18: Dominant species found in the natural vegetation in lower part (<800m) of MWS 125 in Upper Mahaweli Watershed

column2: Nothopegia beddomei, Dimocarpus longen ,Artocarpus nobilis, Filicium decipiens, Cullenia zeylanica, Myristica dactyloides, Garcilia ceylanica, G. qusitha Pomithia pinnata, Syzygium spp. Neolitsea cassia, Vitex altissima, Bhesa nitidissima, Careya arborea, Cinnamomum dubium, Eugenia mooniana, Palaquium hinmolpedda.

Celtis philippnensis, Actinodaphne spp., Actinodaphne candolleana, Symplocos spp., Syzygium spp., Barringtonia racemosa Acronychia pedunculata , Ficus racemosa, Glochidion mooni, Litsea gardneri, Viscum capitellatum.
Glochidion mooni Glycosmis angustifolia, , Memecylon spp, Psychotria spp, Lasianthus spp, Hedyotis spp., Litsea iteodaphne, Osbeckia spp, Lasianthus strigosus,. and Strobilanthes spp.
